text:
Well, maybe they're just naive... and such things
shouldn't be happening in the future...

───Sigh...
Even so, that's no excuse for making such a ruckus.
Motion
Motion

-H-Hey...
M-Madoka-chan, are you also... practicing on your own?
Motion

Even though Madoka-chan, you can sing and dance...
totally fine...

...You too Koito.
Singing and dancing. You're doing totally fine.

W-Well...
I wasn'tー good enough, I guess...

I know you've been practicing by yourself
for a long time.
Motion

I finally got to be with everyone...
And yet...
Maybe at the end of it all... I'm just as concerned as you.
Motion

Just going, running on and on, never stopping to look back...
it's so nervewracking. So touch-and-go.
Motion

Hey... Toru senpai.
Why did you decide to be an idol?

Huh? Hmm...
Why not?

The Producer.
Is it because he asked you to?

Ah-...
Maybe so.

Then Hinana's gotta tell the
Producer thanks, right～

You became an idol, and then Hinana became one,
and it's all been super fun, right～?

Aah. I see.
Then, yeah. Glad for that. Becoming one.
Motion

...How do you put it across, exactly...
The way they...sparkle... glitter.

If I can't find them anything, then there was no meaning.
No point to having ever brought them here in the first place.

...Don't give up.
For every shot you miss, just take five more...!
